message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you.  Given its features and benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $11,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about $9,500?
